tickets.reason: Requires shared types: ParsedPRDescription, OutcomeItem, KnownLimitation, ParseError

in_scope: Create xtask/src/aat/parser.rs with PR description parsing logic
Add pub mod parser to xtask/src/aat/mod.rs
Use regex to extract ## Usage section content
Use regex to extract ## Expected Outcomes and parse checkbox items
Use regex to extract ## Evidence Script code block
Use regex to extract ## Known Limitations with WAIVER-ID references
Return ParseError::MissingUsage for missing ## Usage section
Return ParseError::MissingExpectedOutcomes for missing ## Expected Outcomes section
Handle markdown variations: extra whitespace, different heading levels, code fence styles
Write unit tests for each internal parser helper

steps: Add pub mod parser to xtask/src/aat/mod.rs

Implement parse_expected_outcomes() to extract checkbox items as Vec<OutcomeItem>
Implement parse_evidence_script() to extract bash/shell code block content

criteria: pub mod parser declared in xtask/src/aat/mod.rs
